Class IngredientService

java.lang.Object
com.bbbb.data.Ingredient.IngredientService
public class IngredientService extends Object
Service class for handling Ingredient related database operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    IngredientService(Database database)
    Constructs an IngredientService with a database connection.

    • IngredientService

      public IngredientService(Database database)
      Constructs an IngredientService with a database connection.
      Parameters:
      database - The database connection to be used by this service.

  • Method Details

    • createNewIngredient

      public void createNewIngredient(String ingredient_name, String category, BigDecimal quantity)
      Create a new ingredient and fill in its details
      Parameters:
      ingredient_name - The name of the ingredient
      category - The category that the ingredient belongs to
      quantity - How much quantity that the ingredient has

    • deleteIngredient

      public void deleteIngredient(Ingredient ingredient)
      Deletes an unused ingredient from the database
      Parameters:
      ingredient - The ingredient that will be deleted

    • getAllIngredients

      public List<Ingredient> getAllIngredients()
      Create a list of all the ingredients that are in the inventory
      Returns:
      List of all the ingredients in the inventory

    • getIngredientQuantity

      public BigDecimal getIngredientQuantity(Ingredient ingredient)
      Find how much of an ingredient is in inventory (its quantity)
      Parameters:
      ingredient - The ingrendient that needs its quantity queried
      Returns:
      A decimal value of the ingredient's quantity

    • getItemIngredientQuantity

      public BigDecimal getItemIngredientQuantity(Item item, Ingredient ingredient)
      Get a decimal value of a quantity that is an ingredient for a specific item
      Parameters:
      item - The item that needs to be looked at
      ingredient - The ingredient that is checked
      Returns:
      A decimal value for the quantity. A nonzero value means that an item needs x amount of ingredients per order.

    • updateIngredientQuantity

      public void updateIngredientQuantity(Ingredient ingredient, BigDecimal newQuantity)
      Change the quantity of an ingredient based on its ID
      Parameters:
      ingredient - Ingredient being changed
      newQuantity - Updated quantity value for the ingredient

    • restockIngredient

      public void restockIngredient(Ingredient ingredient, BigDecimal addedQuantity)
      Add to the ingredient's current quantity
      Parameters:
      ingredient - Ingredient being changed
      addedQuantity - Value being added to the quantity of the ingredient

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder(List<Item> items)
      Update the ingredient quantites per item after an order has been placed
      Parameters:
      items - list of all the items in the order
